entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow ending in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
